CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BRC Inc is a Veteran-founded coffee company serving premium coffee. Its products include Dark Roast Bundle, New Roast Bundle, Perfect Pair Bundle, Thin Blue Line, Organic Coffee, and Vanilla Coffee Roast among others.
